meta.article_title: November 4, 2019 - How to Push Extremely Heavy

causes_communes: Having two players practice heavy pushes at the same time

debutant.wrist: Bring wrist back before contact and then use both wrist and forearm to smoothly accelerate the racket.

debutant.racket_angle: Graze the ball with a relatively open racket

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice grazing the ball with an open racket, accelerating through contact, and using wrist to add spin.

metriques_progression: Vary the speed of your serves and pushes during practice
erreurs_a_eviter: Developing a heavy push only against incoming heavy pushes
